document_data.name: Oreal Nanther
document_data.mainbody:
}
'''Oreal Nanther''' was the heir of [[Nanther|House Nanther]] in [[Melvaunt]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Oreal was undergoing training as a ranger but with little conviction.
document_data.History:
In 1374 DR, he secretly met with his friends [[Argens Bruil]], [[Kalman Leiyraghon]], [[Kara Calaudra]], and [[Elaint Marsk]] and they planned to go adventuring, with the support of the [[dwarf]] mercenary [[Dorn Crownshield]].

They found a treasure map (in truth, a trap devised by [[Bremen Leiyraghon]]) and went to adventure in [[Thar]], only to be captured by the [[orog]] [[Daazlag]] and his [[orc]] minions.

Oreal was imprisoned in a cave in the [[XÃ»l-Jarak]] citadel with all his friends.

Oreal was rescued by an adventuring party hired by his father [[Woarsten Nanther]].
document_data.Personality: Oreal was a carefree, spoiled, and reckless individual. He believed that the young generation would abolish the division between great houses of Melvaunt. Oreal was also too trusting.
